This is an implementation of Convolutional Neural Collaborative Filtering (ConvNCF) using [R Keras](https://keras.rstudio.com/index.html). The model is described in the following paper and implemented by its authors using Tensorflow (see [this GitHub repo](https://github.com/duxy-me/ConvNCF)).

> Du, Xiaoyu, Xiangnan He, Fajie Yuan, Jinhui Tang, Zhiguang Qin, and Tat-Seng Chua. [Modeling Embedding Dimension Correlations via Convolutional Neural Collaborative Filtering.](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3357154) ACM Transactions on Information Systems (TOIS) 37, no. 4 (2019): 1-22.
